description:
Taikoubou and his friends come face-to-face with Dakki. However, the Dakki they face turns out to be Youzen, a doushi from Mount Kunlun. He wishes to help Taikoubou, but Youzen wants to test him first. Kou Hiko rushes to the  imperial palace before anything bad happens to his wife and sister.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 太公望, 楊戩に試される
